entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
